Literature.Title: F365 has increased potency and efﬁcacy, decreased acute toxicity and nephrotoxicity, and higher unbound lung exposure. Carbapenem-resistant isolates
Literature.Author: Roberts KD, Zhu Y, Azad MAK, Han ML, Wang J, Wang L, Yu HH, Horne AS, Pinson JA, Rudd D, Voelcker NH, Patil NA, Zhao J, Jiang X, Lu J, Chen K, Lomovskaya O, Hecker SJ, Thompson PE, Nation RL, Dudley MN, Griffith DC, Velkov T, Li J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA025(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA038(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii FADDI-AB030(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii FADDI-AB034(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae FADDI-KP032(MIC=<0.125µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae FADDI-KP065(MIC=<0.125µg/ml)
